actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1780 (a)(2) of title 38, United States Code, so as to liberalize the absence accounting procedures for veterans or eligible persons enrolled in a course which does not lead to a standard college degree.

summary.text: Revises the absence accounting procedures for veterans or eligible persons enrolled in a Veterans' Administration financed course which does not lead to a standard college degree. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1780(a)(2))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1780 (a)(2) of title 38, United States Code, so as to liberalize the absence accounting procedures for veterans or eligible persons enrolled in a course which does not lead to a standard college degree.
